column1: * 1916 - J.R.R. Tolkien receives his degree from the University of Oxford.
* 1921 - J.R.R. Tolkien is appointed to membership of the Faculty of Arts and the Board of the Faculty Arts at the Leeds University.
* 1933 - Tolkien writes Letter to Kenneth Sisam (16 March 1933).
* 1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Hans-Jörg Modlmayr (16 March 1967).
* 2004 - The World of Tolkien is published.
** Borondir is on his way in search of the Éothéod.
** Mustering of the Army of the West. Last Debate of the commanders outside Minas Tirith.
** Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee travel northward along the Morgai. They look out over the camp to Mount Doom.
